title: Blue Curse
description: Original cover edition.WHO'S AFRAID OF THE BLUE WOLF?Cursed on assignment, a special ops soldier finds himself transforming into a creature of local legend.Seven feet tall, 400 pounds, and packed with lupine assets, Jason is now the dreaded Blue Wolf — a role he never asked for in a land far from home. The price for a cure? Eliminating the region’s most notorious warlord, the White Dragon.From the icy peaks of Central Asia to the urban canyons of Manhattan, and with the help of a bookish wizard named Prof Croft, Jason strains his newfound powers to their limits. Because with the curse now eating away his mind, he’s running out of time.Succeed and he returns home to his fiancée and a future.Fail and he dies a bloodthirsty beast…Blue Wolf is a feature series in the quarter-million selling Croftverse. If you like brawn, brains, and big weapons to go with an even bigger heart, you'll love the Blue Wolf!
author: Brad Magnarella
